job.title: Accountant
job.description: AccountantAccountant Opening - Houston, TX  Our recruitment firm is seeking trustworthy Accountant to work for our client, a global manufacturing company. To ensure success, the Accountant should be prompt, honest, detail-oriented, professional, and analytical. Candidates should have a firm grasp of accounting and financial practices and regulations and possess strong computer skills. If you are looking for a career change with a great team environment, this is the job for you!    Accountant Duties and Responsibilities:Maintain general ledgerPrepare budgetsFinancial reconciliationProfit and loss for multiple entitiesPerform month end closing Report Sales Tax monthlyMaintain Account ReceivableCode Account payable for all vendors' billsAccountant Preferred Education, Experience, & Requirements:Bachelor's in accounting2-5 years of relevant experience in AccountingProficient with MS Office products including excellent Excel skillsMicrosoft Dynamics preferredGreat communication skillsTeam player HOUAC49
